dataaccesslayer

Interface TutorsDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TutorsDaoImpl

    public interface TutorsDao
    This interface represents the data access object for Tutors. It provides methods to retrieve, add, update and delete Tutors. Assignment 2 Class: CST8288 - Lab Section: 013 Lab Professor: Siju Philip Date: Mar. 30, 2023

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTutor(TutorDTO tutor)
      Adds a Tutor to the database.
      void deleteTutor(TutorDTO tutor)
      Deletes a Tutor from the database.
      java.util.List<TutorDTO> getAllTutors()
      Retrieves a list of all Tutors from the database.
      TutorDTO getTutorByTutorId(int tutorId)
      Retrieves a TutorDTO object with the given ID from the database.
      TutorDTO getTutorByTutorName(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      Retrieves a TutorDTO object with the given first and last name from the database.
      void updateTutor(TutorDTO tutor)
      Updates a Tutor in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllTutors

        java.util.List<TutorDTO> getAllTutors()
        Retrieves a list of all Tutors from the database.
        Returns:
        A list of TutorDTO objects representing all Tutors in the database.

      • getTutorByTutorName

        TutorDTO getTutorByTutorName(java.lang.String firstName,
                             java.lang.String lastName)
        Retrieves a TutorDTO object with the given first and last name from the database.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the Tutor to retrieve.
        lastName - The last name of the Tutor to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A TutorDTO object representing the Tutor with the given first and last name.

      • getTutorByTutorId

        TutorDTO getTutorByTutorId(int tutorId)
        Retrieves a TutorDTO object with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        tutorId - The ID of the Tutor to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A TutorDTO object representing the Tutor with the given ID.

      • addTutor

        void addTutor(TutorDTO tutor)
        Adds a Tutor to the database.
        Parameters:
        tutor - The TutorDTO object representing the Tutor to add.

      • updateTutor

        void updateTutor(TutorDTO tutor)
        Updates a Tutor in the database.
        Parameters:
        tutor - The TutorDTO object representing the Tutor to update.

      • deleteTutor

        void deleteTutor(TutorDTO tutor)
        Deletes a Tutor from the database.
        Parameters:
        tutor - The TutorDTO object representing the Tutor to delete.
